IAeActivityParent, IAeBpelObject, IAeCompensationCallback, IAeExecutableBpelObject, IAeExecutableQueueItem, IAeFCTHandler, IAeFunctionFactory, IAeLocatableObject, IAeNamespaceContext, IAeVisitable
public class AeCoordinatorCompensationHandler
extends AeCompensationHandler
implements IAeCompensationCallback

Compensation handler for a coordinated invoke activity.

isEnableCoordinatedActivityCompensation

protected boolean isEnableCoordinatedActivityCompensation()
Returns true if the coordinated activities (invokes) should also be compensated after executing the normal list of CompInfo object.

Overrides:
isEnableCoordinatedActivityCompensation in class AeCompensationHandler
Returns:
false since this is the handler for coordinated activities.

getCoordinationId

public java.lang.String getCoordinationId()
Description copied from interface: IAeCompensationCallback
Returns the coordinationId if this is a coordinated comp info. This information is normally used during state save/restore procedures.

getDefinition

public AeBaseDef getDefinition()
This object gets for a coordinated invoke activity. As such, there is no definition object and calling this method results in an exception.

Overrides:
getDefinition in class AeAbstractBpelObject
See Also:
AeAbstractBpelObject.getDefinition()
